description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. The Zombie Apocalypse has come! Can you survive the hordes until you are rescued? First person shooter survival game with unlockable weapons to destroy 1000's of Zombies.
description.short: The Zombie Apocalypse has come! Can you survive the hordes until you are rescued? First person shooter survival game with unlockable weapons to destroy 1000's of Zombies.
